MKV of somebody else's upload.  Here is original NFO, mediainfo follows:

This is HARD BOILED, a true 1080p transfer from Japan.

Audio is the original theatrical, in 16 bit 2 channel PCM mono. This is vastly superior to the terrible 5.1 remixes we have had on all DVD and BD releases. 

Subtitles have been added and this is the best translation ever created. They are not automatic so YOU NEED TO TURN THEM ON with your remote. 

No enus. This is a 24GB Blu-Ray. There was no room for any fluff.
